name: Sky Train Surfers
description:
Run as fast as you can and dodge the trains that are about to collide with you. To dodge obstacles and collect coins, you need to take great reflexes to move, jump and slide.

- Dash, surf, run to avoid barriers & trains.
- Differ scenes to dash
- Smooth run control
- Amazing rhythm
- Colorful and vivid HD graphics!
- Hoverboard Surfing!

Start Sky Train Surfers, to be best runner!
